title: Castle Mountains National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News        News Releases The National Park Service makes every effort to keep you informed about breaking news, special events, and new and ongoing projects. News releases for Castle Mountains National Monument will be posted and archived here, so check back often to keep current with the latest happenings at the park.  Park Newspaper Neighboring Mojave National Preserve's park newspaper is a great resource to help you plan your trip to Castle Mountains and learn more about the area and help you plan a visit.
